title: Introduction to Angular
content:
Welcome to Angular Mastery Hub! Angular is a powerful, full-featured framework for building dynamic web applications. Created and maintained by Google, Angular provides everything you need to build scalable, maintainable applications.

Angular uses TypeScript as its primary language, which brings strong typing, advanced IDE support, and modern JavaScript features to your development workflow. The framework follows component-based architecture, making your code modular and reusable.
objectives: Understand what Angular is and its key benefits
Learn about Angular's architecture and core concepts
Explore the Angular ecosystem and tools
Understand the difference between AngularJS and Angular

codeExamples.title: Your First Angular Component
codeExamples.explanation: This is a basic Angular component that demonstrates the core building blocks: the @Component decorator, template with interpolation, and a simple property binding.

codeExamples.title: Using the Component
codeExamples.explanation: Components are used by their selector in templates. Angular will replace the <app-hello-world> tag with the component's template.

exercises.title: Create Your First Component
exercises.description: Create a personal greeting component that displays your name and favorite programming language.
hints: Use the @Component decorator to define your component
Add a template with interpolation to display dynamic content
Create properties for name and favorite language
Don't forget to export your component class
